definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

sentences.english: "The abductee issue is [one] of grave concern, " Clinton said.
sentences.chinese: “绑架问题值得严重关切，”希拉里说。

sentences.english: LeBron will catch him, but today it's still Bird.
sentences.chinese: 勒布朗会追上他的，但现在还是拉里伯德。

sentences.english: Entonces tu ídolo pasaba por Magic Johnson o Larry Bird.
sentences.chinese: 那你一定喜欢魔术师约翰逊和拉里伯德了。

sentences.english: He faces an uphill battle against either Obama or Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 他将面对与奥巴马或者希拉里的升级选战。

sentences.english: Recent polls in Indiana give a slight edge to Clin ton.
sentences.chinese: 最近的民调结果给希拉里还来了微弱的优势。

sentences.english: Her selection is still to be formalized and will not be announced until after Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 在感恩节结束之前，希拉里不会正式宣布其决定。

sentences.english: Larry Goodson says that left a lot of residual bad feeling towards the U.S. in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 拉里古德森说，这使巴基斯坦对美国留下了很多不满。

sentences.english: Should Scolari give Sheva a chance?
sentences.chinese: 斯科拉里该给舍瓦机会吗？

sentences.english: Hillary was a good choice, she can tell a lie without even blinking.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里是一个不错的选择，丫简直说谎不带眨眼的。

sentences.english: Hillary Clinton's returns from Asia having made a first-class debut.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在亚洲展现了第一流的初次亮相。

sentences.english: Hillary’s mother, Dorothy, and Chelsea were going with me to India.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里的母亲桃乐西和切尔西陪我一起去了印度。

sentences.english: Scolari, meanwhile, is relishing his new role at the Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 斯科拉里正在斯坦福桥享受自己的新角色。

sentences.english: Larry is too lazy to lift a finger.
sentences.chinese: 拉里懒得不想动指头去帮任何人。

sentences.english: Larry Ellison loves to poke at it.
sentences.chinese: 拉里埃里森喜欢攻击它。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said he presided over a " narco- state."
sentences.chinese: 国务卿希拉里说卡尔扎伊管理的是一个“毒品国家”。
希拉里于本周五满60周岁。

definition: to display/to spread out/to distribute/old spelling of 盧布|卢布[lu2 bu4], ruble
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
